participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and determined, loves challenges and outdoor activities.
participant_1.background: my favorite activity is rock climbing. i'm a mechanical engineer. i like to go hiking in the spring. i live in colorado.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and quirky, has a passion for animals and unique collections.
participant_2.background: i love cats and have two cats. i've a weakness for vanilla ice cream. my favorite season is winter. i have a hat collection of over 1000 hats.
